intro: Jesus had a lot to say about the kingdom of heaven - what it's like, where you find it, who's a part of it. How well do you remember His words?

questions.ask: What tiny seed did Jesus liken the kingdom of heaven to?
What door-openers to the kingdom of heaven did Jesus say He would give to Peter?
What group of people, whom the disciples tried to keep from Jesus, did Jesus say are true possessors of the kingdom of heaven?
What repetitive phrase, according to Jesus, will not guarantee entry into the kingdom of heaven?
What two groups, according to Jesus in the Beatitudes, would inherit the kingdom of heaven?
questions.ans: the poor in spirit, those persecuted for righteousness

intro: We're not talking Burger King, here... we want to know what you know about the men who ruled the nations of Bible times.

questions.ask: Which apostle defended himself before a king named Agrippa - and tried to convert him in the process?
What king unwittingly signed a decree that caused his friend, Daniel, to be thrown into a den of lions?
What prophet had a dramatic vision and calling from God in the year that King Uzziah died?
What king of Persia permitted the Jews in his realm to return to Jerusalem to rebuild the temple?
What king of Gath fell for David's trick of feigning insanity - and let him go free

intro: They weren't always romantic, but there are several stories of kisses in the Bible. What do you recall about the following?

questions.ask: What disciple betrayed Jesus with a kiss?
What best friend of David kissed him when David fled from King Saul?
What part of Jesus' body did a sinful woman anoint with perfume and kiss during a dinner at a Pharisee's house?
What future wife did Jacob kiss the first time he met her - as she watered a flock of sheep?
What kind of kiss did the apostle Paul tell the Corinthians to greet each other with?

intro: No, it's not the opening of a silly joke. In this category, you'll need to show your knowledge of "knocking" in the Bible

questions.ask: What two commands on prayer, besides "knock," did Jesus give during His Sermon on the Mount?
What servant girl, in her excitement at learning Peter was out of prison and at the door, left him knocking while she ran to tell the other disciples?
What did Jesus say servants should be doing when their master, returning from a wedding banquet, knocked on the door?
What did Jesus tell church members in Laodicea He would do with them if they opened the door to His knocking?
What kind of knocking accompanied the handwriting on the wall that terrified the Babylonian king Belshazzar?
questions.ans: the knocking together of the king's knees
